ComicInfo.Summary: 'REVELATIONS 3:4' War. With Emissary's appearance serving notice of a new world order, tensions long kept in check boil over into global bloodshed. As Emissary comes to understand the effects of his arrival, he is compelled to make a decision - will he go against a government that wants to keep the world's first superhuman under its control?
ComicInfo.Title: Revelations 3:4
